name: knowye_dev
description:
know what you eat, knowye, is a food centric guest engagement platform for restaurants
    Hosts can connect with guests to
    1. tell their story
    2. get feedback
    3. operate with analytics
    Guests can
    1. personalize menus to their preferences
    2. add items to favorites or wishlist
    3. rate or select items,
    preview bill
    Proudly served to you by dyjit.#areyeintheknow
